article_title: Federal guidance on wellness incentives receives qualified welcome
article_text:
Health benefits experts say there are some holes that need to be filled and clarifications that need to be made in long-awaited federal rules that would govern the use of financial incentives in workplace wellness programs.

The rules proposed April 17 by the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission include stricter limits on the structure and dollar value of incentives that employers
